articles.title: Maine EMS vaccine locations allowing Mainers to book appointments ahead of eligibility - NewsCenterMaine.com WCSH-WLBZ
articles.description: Maine EMS has set up a system for Mainers to sign up for a COVID vaccine appointment even if they are not yet age-eligible but will be by the date of appointment.
articles.content:
MAINE, USA If you are waiting your turn for a COVID-19 vaccine, there is a way to set up an appointment right now for when you become eligible.
